thread.title: Not a Wolf of Wall Street in Sight !
thread.title_full: Not a Wolf of Wall Street in Sight ! - Review of Andaz Wall Street, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: williambillp2016
title: Not a Wolf of Wall Street in Sight !
text: The Andaz Wall Street makes for a great retreat and base with which to explore New York. The staff are amazingly friendly, the rooms are clean and spacious, and the location is ideal for wandering around the city. The glass enclosed shower has a very good, strong pressure, rain forest shower head. The toiletries are first class. If you stay at the Andaz be sure to check out the bars and restaurants on Stone Street, which is located just a few short blocks from the Andaz.
